competitors.name: Logstash
competitors.notes: Part of ELK Stack, Elastic product

context: In 2015, Elastic was a growth-stage startup (Series C funding) building on open-source Elasticsearch popularity. The company rebranded from Elasticsearch to Elastic and consolidated ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana). Splunk was the commercial leader in log analytics. The market saw growing adoption of Elasticsearch for search and log analytics use cases. Elastic positioned as open-source alternative to commercial Splunk with enterprise support options.
